MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm GetAsymmetricAlgorithm (string algorithm, bool privateKey);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm GetAsymmetricAlgorithm(string algorithm, bool privateKey) cil managed

Docs.param: when a private key is required to create the algorithm; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
Docs.returns:
An that represents the specified asymmetric cryptographic algorithm.
Typically, is passed into the parameter, as a private key is typically required for decryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm GetHashAlgorithmForSignature(string algorithm) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a cryptographic algorithm that generates a hash for a digital signature.
Docs.returns: A that generates hashes for digital signatures.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureDeformatter GetSignatureDeformatter(string algorithm) cil managed

Docs.param: The deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.
Docs.returns: An that represents the deformatter algorithm for the digital signature.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A signature deformatter is typically used to verify a digital signature.
Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricSignatureFormatter GetSignatureFormatter(string algorithm) cil managed

Docs.param: The formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.
Docs.returns: An that represents the formatter algorithm for the digital signature.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Typically, a signature formatter is used to generate a digital signature.
Use the static fields of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityAlgorithms> class to specify the algorithm.
